**As a** [type of user],  
**I want** [some goal],  
**So that** [some reason].

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2
- [ ] Criterion 3

### Additional Information
Add any other context, screenshots, or relevant details here.

### Notes
- Priority: [High / Medium / Low]
- Estimated Effort: [Estimated time or complexity]
- Dependencies: [Related tasks or user stories]
